body:
Comment 1: 
Shakeel,

I could be wrong, but, I think, our wiki instructions are wrong. Can you, please, try

hg clone -u go1.0.3 https://code.google.com/p/go go-exp

command instead.

hg clone https://code.google.com/p/go go-exp

command will download "latest" version of exp packages - it is incompatible with your
source files (these are of version 1.0.3, as per your description). You want exp/...
files as they were back then, when go 1.0.3 was released.

Alternatively, if you already have go-exp directory, you could just do "hg up -r
go1.0.3", so you don't need to download everything again.

Alex
_Status changed to **WaitingForReply**._
